reviews.review_msg: Nice attitude and a very caring prof. Lectures were kind of boring, but he does try his best. Assignments were easy and tests were okay.

Overall my experience with the course was very poor. As a fourth year student, if I had encountered this professor earlier in my undergraduate career I would have reconsidered my program choice due to this professor's teaching ability and attitude. I felt that the professor was actively attempting to create an inconvenience for students.

I had Dr. Kjeang for Statistics and Engineering Measurement.  The class is boring as hell, but he does the best he can with it.  He's funny, and the lectures are very clear.  He also has a good attitude towards his students and his exams were very fair.
